name: Prescience
description:
Unlike other single player deckbuilder, you are going to fill a bag with black and white stones. Wether you can use your skills depends on the order you pick your stones from your bag. Balance the amount of black and white stones, Build a unique combo, defeat powerful enemies, and use your Prescience to get into the Prescience Leaderboard.

Features



• Stone Bag
Fill your stone bag with Yin(black) and Yang(white) stones. You need to randomly pick your stone in the right order to cast your skills. Balance the amount of Yin and Yang stones to increase the possibility of perfect casting.


• Deck Building
Choose your favorite school and skills! You may obtain more passives and skill books during each attempt. Some skills have multiple volumes. Equipping them at the same time will power up the skill massively. 


• Map Exploration
Pick your own path on the map. You need to manage the use of your limited energy bar. It’s up to you to explore every single tile or to skip some battles.

Most Importantly, here is a cat!
